name: Stick Fighter
description:
Stick Fighter takes inspiration in games like Street Figther and Art of Fighting.

You will be able to control a stickman with the objective of trying to defeat the AI. To do so, you will have multiple attacks and some special moves.

Attention

The game was fully developed to be used with a gamepad. It currently doesn't support keyboard and you can only use the d-pad (joystick support in the next update).

Credits
  • Stickman Assets by Overcrafted
  • Game Background by Free Game Assets
  • SFX by Shapeforms
  • Menu Music by FruityAudio
  • Game Music by Bensound
